name: $surgery
desc: Goal suspended or ended because of a significant life event (marital change, bereavement, etc.).

name: $life-event
desc: Goal has been superseded by a new goal.

name: $replaced
desc: Patient wishes the goal to be set aside, at least temporarily.

name: $patient-request
desc: Goal can not be reached temporarily.

name: $temp-not-attainable
desc: Goal can not be reached permanently.

name: $permanent-not-attainable
desc: Goal can not be reached due to financial barrier or reason.

name: $financial-barrier
desc: Goal can not be reached due to a lack of transportation.

name: $lack-of-transportation
desc: Goal can not be reached due to a lack of social support.
